item.title: The Best Terraform Feature Yet?
item.description: Optional attributes for object type constraints is almost here! I’ve been waiting for this feature to come along for a while. I have tested it extensively in -alpha, and I can confidently confirm that it is a game changer. This feature is long in the making, being discussed as far back as this thread in 2018. Today, it is now in beta, so the official release could be any day now. Let’s demonstrate how this is useful and build some common AWS infrastructure.
